attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All those who are not citizens of this tightly packed Isle should be immediately sent back to their country of origin or detained until such a time as they can be.  Appeals should be limited to 1 attempt only and should be fast tracked by a permanent and dedicated team.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Immediately repatriate ALL illegal immigrants."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12534.asp

Prime Minister's Office
